response.overview: The film is a historical review dedicated to the national hero of Armenia, Monte Melkonyan. The script is directed by the director. It tells the story of an American schoolboy who, by chance, ended up in California. The next lesson reminded him of the history of his ancestors, which had frozen his gaze. And when the teacher finished the lesson, he saw the boy and it became clear who that boy was. He was 14-year-old Monte Melkonyan.
response.title: Ես Կվերադառնամ
